message_1: Given a message, "Hello World", apply the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function and provide the resulting hash value.
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello World", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the resulting hash value:

`64ec88ca00b268e5ba1a35678a1b5316d212f4f366b2477232534a8aeca37f3c`
